mapper.select: SELECT /* SpecialPurchaseCount.getSpecialProductCount, 특가 상품 여부 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2015-03-26 */ count(1) FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND PROD_ID =#{productId} AND EXPO_YN ='Y' AND CPN_ID IS NOT NULL AND TO_DATE(#{purchaseDate},'yyyymmddhh24miss') BETWEEN SPRC_APPLY_START_DT AND SPRC_APPLY_END_DT

SELECT /* SpecialPurchaseCount.getProductInfo, 상품 기본정보(서비스 그룹) 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2015-03-26 */ A.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , B.PROD_ID , A.SVC_GRP_CD , A.SVC_TYPE_CD , A.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.META_CLSF_CD , A.TOP_MENU_ID , C.CATALOG_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD A ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B ,TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = B.PART_PROD_ID AND B.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{productId} AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND C.BASE_YN ='Y' AND C.USE_YN ='Y' AND D.TENANT_ID =#{tenantId}

SELECT /* SpecialPurchaseCount.getSpecialProdCount, 특가 상품 존재 유무 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2015-03-26 */ NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS COUNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD_PRCHS_MANG WHERE 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{productId} AND TO_CHAR(PRCHS_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24') = SUBSTR(#{purchaseDate},0,10)

SELECT /* SpecialPurchaseCount.getSpecialPurchaseCount, 특가 상품 구매수 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2015-03-26 */ NVL(PRCHS_CNT, 0) AS PRCHS_CNT FROM TB_DP_SPRC_PROD_PRCHS_MANG WHERE 1=1 AND PROD_ID = #{productId} AND TO_CHAR(PRCHS_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24') = SUBSTR(#{purchaseDate},0,10)
